info.description: Returns available TUIFlightQuotes given the search/filer criteria provided.
info.title: TUIFlightQuotes API

get.description:
By passing in the appropriate options, you can search for
available TUIFlightQuotes in the system

parameters.name: queryType
parameters.description: type of query made. Options are one-way or retour (retour is default)

parameters.name: originAirport
parameters.description: IATA code of the origin airport (single or multiple; comma delimited)

parameters.name: destinationAirport
parameters.description: IATA code of the destination airport (single or multiple; comma delimited)

parameters.name: originDepartureDatePeriodFrom
parameters.description: Date range departing from origin airport [From date]

parameters.name: originDepartureDatePeriodTo
parameters.description: Date range departing from origin airport [To date]

parameters.name: originArrivalDatePeriodFrom
parameters.description: Date range arriving at the origin airport [From date]

parameters.name: originArrivalDatePeriodTo
parameters.description: Date range arriving at the origin airport [To date]

parameters.name: destinationDepartureDatePeriodFrom
parameters.description: Date range departing from destination airport [From date]

parameters.name: destinationDepartureDatePeriodTo
parameters.description: Date range departing from destination airport [To date]

parameters.name: destinationArrivalDatePeriodFrom
parameters.description: Date range arriving at the destination airport [From date]

parameters.name: destinationArrivalDatePeriodTo
parameters.description: Date range arriving at the destination airport [To date]

parameters.name: originDepartureTimeRangeFrom
parameters.description: Time range departing from origin airport [From time]

parameters.name: originDepartureTimeRangeTo
parameters.description: Time range departing from origin airport [To time]

parameters.name: originArrivalTimeRangeFrom
parameters.description: Time range arriving at the origin airport [From time]

parameters.name: originArrivalTimeRangeTo
parameters.description: Time range arriving at the origin airport [To time]

parameters.name: destinationDepartureTimeRangeFrom
parameters.description: Time range departing from destination airport [From time]

parameters.name: destinationDepartureTimeRangeTo
parameters.description: Time range departing from destination airport [To time]

parameters.name: destinationArrivalTimeRangeFrom
parameters.description: Time range arriving at the destination airport [From time]

parameters.name: destinationArrivalTimeRangeTo
parameters.description: Time range arriving at the destination airport [To time]

parameters.name: daysAtDestination
parameters.description: Duration in days of the time spent on the destination. Return on the same day means 1 day at destination.

parameters.name: directFlight
parameters.description: When set to true, will only return direct flights

parameters.name: paxBirthDate
parameters.description: Birthdate of each participant, when not provided will return result for one adult.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items in the response
